name: Ant in a Box
description:
I want to challenge you to reach level 8 and if you do I will give you whatever you want from Playstation store or Xbox :D 

INFORMATION: 

Ant in a Box is a platforming game, where you need to jump and avoid any trap or danger inside each level, and at the end of each level, there is a piece of sugar that you have to collect.

STORY: 

One day an ant fell inside a mystery box. As inside that box a strange world full of dangers, where that ant was trying to get out of that box but she needed to pass off many risks that hinder its way; In each place, the ant needs to take a piece of sugar to get enough power to continue its adventures.

The game contains 10 levels that you have to complete to finish the game, also the game depends on your concentration to complete any level, so if the ant died you will get back to the first point in the level then you have to pass all dangers again!.

DONATION: This game is 100% Free and developing games is expensive. So any amount of donation will really help us to improve and to fund our upcoming games. Thank you!

NOTE: There is a bug in the level selection so sorry for that.
